dataIdInfo.idPurp: A series of tools to help convert a database to GeMS
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Currently functionality exists to drop, null, and rename fields, to populate the IdentityConfidence field based on mapunit designations, and to build DataSources. Glossary, and DMU Table based on master tables managed for a larger project.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Written by Ryan Crow with input from the LOCOS geologic mapping team at the Flagstaff USGS office.
